Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "Used to notify you whenever a specific person or group logs into/out of the game. "

"+see enable\\r\\n Enable notifications\\r\\n\\r\\n+see disable\\r\\n Disable notifications\\r\\n\\r\\n+see add kalle\\r\\n Add Kalle's account (zwoc) to your +see-list\\r\\n\\r\\n+see add group coders\\r\\n Add the +see group \\"coders\\" to your +see-list\\r\\n\\r\\n+see sub kalle\\r\\n Remove Kalle's account (zwoc) from your list\\r\\n\\r\\n+see sub zwoc\\r\\n Remove the account Zwoc from your list\\r\\n\\r\\n+see sub group coders\\r\\n Remove the group \\"coders\\" from your +see-list\\r\\n\\r\\n+see add roane to coders\\r\\n Add Roane's account to the \\"coders\\" group\\r\\n\\r\\n+see sub roane from coders\\r\\n Remove Roane's account from the \\"coders\\" group\\r\\n\\r\\n+see groups\\r\\n List all available groups\\r\\n\\r\\n+see list\\r\\n Display your SEE-list\\r\\n\\r\\n+see list coders\\r\\n Display all members of the group \\"coders\\"\\r\\n\\r\\n+see disband coders\\r\\n Destroy the group \\"coders\\"\\r\\n"
"+see [enable\|disable\|groups]\\r\\n+see add\|sub \\|\\\r\\n+see add\|sub group \\\r\\n+see add\|sub \ too\|from \\\r\\n+see list [\]\\r\\n+see disband \\\r\\n"
